chaofanmod:power.Flammable.NAME: Flammable
DESCRIPTIONS: If you are not #yVulnerable. Gain #b%d #yVulnerable when you draw a #yBurn.

chaofanmod:power.Spark.NAME: Spark
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of its turn, #ySpirit #yFire lose #b%d #yStrength if it's positive.

chaofanmod:power.Dazzled.NAME: Dazzled
DESCRIPTIONS: After you play #b%d cards, the next #yNon-Exhaust card you played will be #yExhausted, then reset amount to #b%d.
After you play #b%d card, the next #yNon-Exhaust card you played will be #yExhausted, then reset amount to #b%d.
The next #yNon-Exhaust card you played will be #yExhausted, then reset amount to #b%d.
